name: Snake (itch) (Arpan Neupane)
description: This is the Snake game. Your goal in this game is to not crash into yourself or to anywhere else. Your goal is to survive and you do that by eating food that will be displayed on the screen. The more food you consume, the bigger you grow. The bigger you grow, your difficulty level gets higher and so does your score when you consume the food. To move the snake up you can use the "Up" arrow key, to move it down you can use the "Down" arrow key, to move it left you can use the "Left" arrow key, and to move it right you can use the "Right" arrow key. If you have any questions or comments you can email me at arpanneupane19@gmail.com HAVE FUN PLAYING!!!
